item.title: Roblox: Squid Td Codes (February 2025)
item.description:
Squid Td is a well-made time-killer inspired by the popular Squid Game series. Here, as in many other tower defense games, you will find an interesting campaign with different levels and locations filled with a lot of enemies.

To confront all these enemies, you'll need to assemble a powerful team, which will cost a lot, especially if you're an inactive player. Luckily, in Squid Td , as in most other Roblox games, you can redeem codes that will give you cool rewards and help you achieve your goals faster.

Updated February 23, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: The latest codes below can help you gain useful Cyber Gems and Cash. Be sure to use them while they’re still available, as expired codes won’t help. More codes could be on the way, so check back frequently.

All Squid Td Codes

Working Squid Td Codes

  • CYBER - Redeem this code to get 5x Cyber Gems.
  • SQUIDS - Redeem this code to get 100 Cash.

Expired Squid Td Codes

There are currently no expired Squid Td codes, so redeem active ones as soon as possible to avoid missing out on rewards.

Redeeming Squid Td codes will be equally useful whether you are a beginner or an experienced player. The rewards you receive will help you become better and stronger, so be sure to take advantage of this opportunity.

How to Redeem Codes for Squid Td

Squid Td uses a standard redemption system for Roblox games, so experienced players should have no problem getting rewards. However, if you're a beginner and have never redeemed codes before, or have forgotten how to do so, here are detailed instructions:

  • Launch Squid Td .
  • Pay attention to the lower left corner of the screen. There will be several buttons arranged in two rows. Among them, interact with the second one, in the first row, where the icon contains ABX letters.
  • This will open the redemption menu. This will be the input field where you need to enter one of the working codes mentioned above.
  • Once you have done so, press the Enter key to submit your reward request.

If everything is done correctly, you will see “Success” in the input field and the rewards will be credited to your account. If it doesn't work, make sure you don't make any mistakes when entering the code manually.

How to Get More Squid Td Codes

Finding more Squid Td codes is actually not difficult either. To do this, visit and carefully monitor the game's official social media, links to which we will leave below. Here, among other content or in a special dedicated section, you will find Roblox codes:

  • Official Squid Td Roblox group.
  • Official Squid Td Discord server.

item.title: Ultra Era Pet Codes (February 2025)
item.description:
Ultra Era Pet is a mobile game about Pokemon, so every fan of the universe will find something for themselves here. You can complete quests and learn more about the story, or just explore cities, fight, and find new Pokemon.

Over time, the game will become more and more difficult, so it's important to find strong Pokémon and level them up. Fortunately, you can redeem Ultra Era Pet codes to get cool rewards, including rare Pokemon.

Updated February 23, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: The latest codes below can help you get valuable in-game rewards to improve your pets. Redeem them while they’re active, as expired codes won’t work anymore. More codes could arrive soon, so keep an eye out for future updates.

All Ultra Era Pet Codes

Working Ultra Era Pet Codes

  • vzk73M - Enter this code to get x200 Crystal.
  • pkq520 - Enter this code to get Pikachu.
  • vip666 - Enter this code to get x10 Fri-Ticket and 6,666 Gold.
  • vip888 - Enter this code to get SR TM Gift and 8,888 Gold.
  • pokemon520 - Enter this code to get x10 Egg-Ticket and 5,200 Gold.
  • pokemon666 - Enter this code to get x200 Crystal and x10 Exp. Candy S.
  • SF6666 - Enter this code to get Gengar.

Expired Ultra Era Pet Codes

Ultra Era Pet has no expired codes yet. All codes are active and you can get rewards for them.

How to Redeem Codes in Ultra Era Pet

If you are an experienced gamer, you know that mobile games and Roblox often contain a code redemption feature. Developers add it so that players can get rewards and spend more time in the game. However, for some reason, redeeming codes is often quite difficult, even for experienced players. In some games, you can redeem codes only on a separate website, while in others you need to complete several levels to unlock this feature. For example, in Ultra Era Pet , you need to go through a long tutorial to redeem codes. If you need help with this, you can use our guide, where we explain how to redeem codes at Ultra Era Pet .

  • Open Ultra Era Pet and look for the Welfare button at the top of the screen. If you don't see it, then you need to play the main quests until you defeat Brock and get the first badge.
  • In Welfare, go to the GiftPackExchange tab.
  • In the dark field, paste the code from the list of working codes and click Get.

Remember that most codes may expire over time, so redeem them immediately to get all the rewards.

How to Get More Ultra Era Pet Codes

Just like with Roblox codes, you can get more codes if you bookmark this guide. We update it frequently, so you will get all the rewards.

Ultra Era Pet is available on mobile devices.

item.title: Avowed: How To Reach The Waterfall Cave In Emerald Stair
item.description:
Quick Links

  • How to Find the Hidden Waterfall Cave in Avowed
  • Get Unique Death Knight Armor & Sabatons in Waterfall Cave

Players will discover several hidden locations and dungeons scattered around different regions of Avowed . One of these hidden locations is the Waterfall Cave, which can be discovered in the Emerald Stair region. The cave entrance is well-hidden, so finding it can be a bit tricky. However, the location is worth exploring as you'll fight one of the power armor sets in Avowed called the Death Knight armor and sabatons inside.

How to Find the Hidden Waterfall Cave in Avowed

Players can find the Hidden Waterfall Cave entrance just west of Fior Mes Iverno in the Emerald Stair region of Avowed . You can start by fast traveling to the River Fork Beacon near the Rootbound Godless Ruins. Once you arrive at the location, follow the river up north until you reach a waterfall. There's a small opening towards the right of the waterfall, enter through there, and you'll find the entrance to the Waterfall Cave.

Players can also find the Painter's Brush unique trinket outside the waterfall cave.

Get Unique Death Knight Armor & Sabatons in Waterfall Cave

Once you enter the Waterfall Cave in Avowed, keep following the path until you reach the main open area. There are going to be some Xaurip enemies here, so eliminate them quickly before proceeding ahead.

Once the area is cleared, there are two paths that you can take from here. There's a pool of water towards the left, and some stone steps leading to an upper area towards the right.

Getting the Death Knight Heavy Armor

If you jump into the pool on the left, you'll see that there's a hidden underwater pathway below. Keep following the path until you surface on the other side of the cavern.

Exit the pool and open the chest in front of you to get the unique Death Knight Armor in Avowed . It's a high-quality heavy armor that provides great protection against damage and comes with two amazing talents.

Getting the Death Knight Sabatons

Now, backtrack your way through the pool into the main area of the Waterfall Cave. Now, go towards the right and up the stone steps and reach the higher platform above. There's a room barricaded with wooden crates and some explosive barrels lying on the floor. Use a ranged weapon or a spell to burst the barrels and break the barricade.

Enter the room to find another chest that you can open up to get the unique Death Knight Sabatons in Avowed . They're part of the Death Knight item set that provides a decent boost to maximum health and also grants bleed and poison resistance.

item.title: Roblox: Dragon Blox Codes (February 2025)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • Dragon Blox Codes
  • How to Redeem Dragon Blox Codes
  • Dragon Blox Tips and Tricks
  • Best Roblox Anime Games Like Dragon Blox
  • About the Dragon Blox Developers

If Roblox players like killing enemies in dynamic battles, completing quests, or just wandering the vast world of Dragon Blox, then this article is for them. Here, they will be able to find Dragon Blox codes, as well as other exciting information about the popular Roblox game. Freebies given by these codes mostly include Zenny and experience, which allow players to progress much faster in the game.

Updated February 23, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: New codes can make a big difference in Dragon Blox . The latest codes below can help you gain power, level up faster, and improve your abilities. Be sure to redeem them before they expire, as new ones often replace old ones. Stay tuned for future updates that may bring even more rewards.

How to Redeem Dragon Blox Codes

Just like other Roblox games, redeeming Dragon Blox codes is pretty easy. To do so, players just need to complete the five simple steps written below:

  1. Open Roblox and launch Dragon Blox .
  2. Open the menu on the left side of the screen.
  3. Click on the settings at the bottom.
  4. Press the “Redeem code” button and enter a code.
  5. After redeeming the code, a confirmation screen will appear.

Dragon Blox Tips and Tricks

Below, players can find tips and Tricks for Dragon Blox :

  • Understand the importance of power in the game, as it unlocks transformations.
  • Rebirthing is crucial and grants health, energy, power gain, and skill damage bonuses.
  • Use skill points to upgrade abilities for better performance.
  • Earn Silver Zenny through quests for purchasing vanity items.
  • Maximize power gain by strategically farming in different zones.

Best Roblox Anime Games Like Dragon Blox

Players who are looking for a game to play instead of Dragon Blox need not worry anymore. That's because this article offers five great games like Dragon Blox . These games also have an anime aesthetic and offer an exciting experience:

  • Titan Warfare
  • A One Piece Game
  • Anime Fruit Simulator
  • Anime Souls Simulator
  • Anime Lost Simulator

About the Dragon Blox Developers

Dragon Blox was released by G RBLX Games in 2021, and the developers frequently update this game. They also have two other interesting games that players may like:

  • Anime Fighting Tycoon
  • Saiyan Fighting Simulator

item.title: War Robots Codes (February 2025)
item.description:
War Robots is a dynamic multiplayer shooter where you and other players will play as robots with different guns and skills. The higher your level, the more components, resources, and robots you will have.

To quickly level up and advance in the game, we recommend redeeming War Robots codes. The rewards from the codes will be many useful things, such as various boosters that will increase your efficiency.

Updated February 23, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: There’s currently only one active code for War Robots , but it's still worth claiming while it lasts. Codes in this game tend to expire quickly, so be sure to use it as soon as possible. Keep an eye out for future updates, as new codes could drop anytime.

All War Robots Codes

Working War Robots Codes

  • WARROBOTS10 - Redeem this code to get ten Defense Boosters, ten Resource Boosters, and ten Attack Boosters.

Expired War Robots Codes

  • GC-SGHQ-SEFLKI
  • GC-SREA-NBCAAO
  • warrobots999
  • WRFIRSTCODE01
  • GC-TOQZ-SKABBD
  • GC-SUDI-AMHVDJ
  • GC-HPKJ-ROOVBS

Regardless of your progress in the game, redeeming War Robots codes will always be a nice bonus. With the rewards you receive, you can level up much faster and unlock more features and robots, so be sure to take advantage of this opportunity.

How to Redeem Codes for War Robots

Redeeming War Robots codes is not difficult, and like in most mobile games, you can do it right after launching the game, even without completing the tutorial. If you don't know where to find the necessary option or don't understand how to redeem codes at all, follow the detailed guidelines below:

  • Launch War Robots .
  • Go to the main menu of the game.
  • Pay attention to the upper right corner of the screen. There will be a button with a gear icon. Click on it.
  • This will open the settings menu. Here, go to the General tab and scroll to the bottom of the menu until you see the Gift Codes section.
  • This section will contain an input field and a green Get Now button next to it. Now, enter manually or, better yet, copy and paste one of the above active codes into the input field.
  • Lastly, click the green Get Now button to submit your reward request.

If everything is done correctly, you will see a list of rewards received on the screen. If it doesn't work, make sure you didn't make any mistakes when entering the code manually, and that you didn't insert an extra space if you copied and pasted it.

How to Get More War Robots Codes

Just as is the case with Roblox codes, you can find more codes on the game's official social media, and luckily, War Robots has plenty of them. By carefully monitoring each of them, it is highly likely that you will find fresh codes, and if not, you can try again later.

  • Official War Robots Reddit account.
  • Official War Robots Facebook page.
  • Official War Robots YouTube channel.
  • Official War Robots Instagram account.

War Robots is available on PC and mobile devices.
